Name: Danijela
description: Danijela is the mother of four children between the ages of 18 and 24 years old and lives in a small minority community in Kosovo. While her husband receives a pension, Danijela works in a primary school doing administration work. In order to increase their income, she and her husband also have worked in agriculture for a long time, based on family tradition. They own cows and pigs, as well as plant corn and wheat on their land. Danijela uses the cowâ€™s milk for her family and also sells the milk and other dairy products in her neighborhood. She is a very hard worker who wants to have a better life for her family and is therefore requesting a loan to expand her stable and eventually increase the number of cows and pigs she owns. Knowing that this is a Kiva loan, she wants to thank all the lenders for their support.
